body_content.explanation: a book or piece of writing that is enjoyable to read and easy to understand:
examples: This book is not an easy read: it demands and deserves your full attention.
This is ideal if you want a fun, easy read for your holiday.

body_content.explanation: a style of written text that is intended to be easy to understand for people who have difficulty with reading and understanding:
examples: The UK government promotes the use of easy read across public services, in order to improve access.
If you provide documents for the public (including on your website) you need to be ready to provide them in Easy Read.
